articles.description: Health authorities in the US and Europe have identified a number of monkeypox cases in recent days, mostly in young men. It’s a surprising outbreak of a disease that rarely appears outside Africa.

Monkeypox belongs to the same virus family as smallpox but causes milder symptoms.
